medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started last night. Majority of pain has resolved by the time of ER arrival this morning. Patient experienced no nausea, vomiting, fevers, or chills. Had prior episodes and was diagnosed with symptomatic cholelithiasis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type II DM, HTN, Hyperlipidemia, chronic CAD, depression, morbid obesity, GERD, COPD, celiac disease, hypothyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: Parents are deceased; mother had a history of diabetes, father had a history of hypertension. Significant familial history of myocardial infarction, lung cancer, esophageal cancer, astrocytoma, gastric cancer, pulmonary embolism, and stroke.
